# [Interview #1060: Graeme + Brandon Sanderson + Three Questions = ?, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1060#2)

#### Graeme Flory

1. On a scale of flashlight to floodlight, how radiant are the words in
*Words of Radiance*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I would say at least 300 broams' worth, if not more. Full broams.
